ygData.subject: RE: Lullaby interrupting casters
ygData.msgSnippet: Yeah, since I orginaly started this thread I did a few duels with my wizzie friend.  We are both 23.  She had a good strategy, she was doing her random
ygData.messageBody:
Yeah, since I orginaly started this thread I did a few
duels with my wizzie friend. We are both 23. She had
a good strategy, she was doing her random teleport
then waiting for me to run at here to blast and
teleport again. Lullabye was sucking, so I switched
to bellow. That made all the difference. Every time
it hit it interupted her, and at a much faster rate
that lullabye does AND I never saw a resist message
for it come up. So for now at least, I go start off
with the guardian/purifying to try and resist the
first blast then get in close with fast weapons and bellow.
_____________________________________________________________
